Name: Berea
Description: Berea is located in the central region of Lesotho, known for its agriculture and being home to the capital city, Maseru.

Name: Butha-Buthe
Description: Butha-Buthe is located in the northern part of Lesotho, known for its mountainous terrain and rural communities.

Name: Leribe
Description: Leribe is located in the northern part of Lesotho, known for its farming and access to South Africa.

Name: Mafeteng
Description: Mafeteng is located in the southern part of Lesotho, known for its agricultural activities and a mix of rural and urban areas.

Name: Mohale s Hoek
Description: Mohale s Hoek is located in the southern part of Lesotho, known for its agriculture and its proximity to the Mohale Dam.

Name: Mokhotlong
Description: Mokhotlong is located in the northeastern part of Lesotho, known for its rugged terrain and agricultural activities.

Name: Qacha s Nek
Description: Qacha s Nek is located in the southeastern part of Lesotho, known for its rural lifestyle and agricultural economy.

Name: Quthing
Description: Quthing is located in the southern part of Lesotho, known for its farming and livestock practices.

Name: Thaba-Tseka
Description: Thaba-Tseka is located in the central part of Lesotho, known for its mountainous landscapes and rural settlements.
